issue.title: [Developer][Integration] Serialize schema- and field-level custom metadata in integration test JSON format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2255](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2255). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I don't believe we are doing this at present. We should validate that each implementation properly handles the incoming metadata from other Arrow emitters

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2255?focusedCommentId=16912504) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] handling of Schema and Field `custom_metadata` is pretty inconsistent. To assert this is properly handled we would need to add it to the integration test JSON format

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2255?focusedCommentId=16912936) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
agreed.  I'll try to make this happen for 1.0.0.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2255?focusedCommentId=17055412) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Looks like this is nearly done. I will review when I can

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2255?focusedCommentId=17058740) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
